title: C. David Elm Pharmacy Practice Scholarship Fund
description: To provide scholarship support for students enrolled in the School of Pharmacy and are active or honorably discharged members of the United States Armed Forces.  If $100K is received within five years, the fund will be administered as a pure endowment.
marketingContent: To provide scholarship support for students enrolled in the School of Pharmacy and are active or honorably discharged members of the United States Armed Forces. If $100K is received within five years, the fund will be administered as a pure endowment.
